mapper.select: WITH FILTER AS ( SELECT * FROM TB_API_LOGS WHERE CREATE_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) SELECT TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS createDt, RESULT_CODE, COUNT(RESULT_CODE) AS codeCount FROM FILTER GROUP BY CREATE_DT, RESULT_CODE
